scripts.build:pages: pnpm run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -R apps/landing/dist/. dist/ && for app in apps/*; do app_name=$(basename "$app"); if [ "$app_name" = "landing" ]; then continue; fi; if [ -d "$app/dist" ]; then mkdir -p "dist/$app_name"; cp -R "$app/dist/." "dist/$app_name/"; fi; done && touch dist/.nojekyll
